experience.description: Built CV models for ASD emotion detection using 17 facial landmarks. Created ROSCO dataset for non-verbal analysis.
Built deep learning pipeline for mosquito segmentation (0.93 IOU) deployed on edge devices across 4 continents. Led modeling team, reduced classification risk by 30%.
Integrated advanced tracking systems with acoustic sensors, achieving 93.4% UAV tracking on edge devices with limited computational resources.
Built sequential models (GRUs/LSTMs) for human behavior prediction (0.89 mAP). Created distributed ML pipeline with PySpark for ~ 2TB datasets.
